scripts.dev: node scripts/predev.mjs --all && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n web,orchestrator,toolserver -c green,blue,magenta "npm -w @vidunpack/web run dev" "npm -w @vidunpack/orchestrator run dev:serve" "node scripts/run-toolserver.mjs"
scripts.build: npm -w @vidunpack/web run build && npm -w @vidunpack/orchestrator run build && cargo build -p vidunpack-toolserver
